parameters: Boss takes damage and moves onto next phase or dies;
Maybe play some sort of hitting animation from the player?
Once it gets hit move it away from the boss to
prevent it from getting hit again.
Remove boss' health and continue the cycle.

var variableId = 20; var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var eventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName == 'BossAttacks'){ var eventKey = [mapId, eventId, 'A']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, false); }; if (EventName == 'BossAnimations'){ var StuneventKey = [mapId, eventId, 'C']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(StuneventKey, false); var eventKey = [mapId, eventId, 'D']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, true); }; }); $gameVariables.setValue(variableId, $gameVariables.value(variableId) + 1);

var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; var eventId = this._eventId; var LaserCoolDown = 600; var PlayerDead = false; var PlayerHit = false; var AlertFrame = 15; var LaserAlertTime = AlertFrame/30; var LaserFrame = 5; var LaserAnimationTime = LaserFrame/30; function FigureHorV(GivenName){ var Coord = "H"; if (GivenName.includes("V")){ Coord = "V"; }; return Coord; }; function OnHit(){ PlayerHit = true; PlayerDead = true; $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var HiteventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName == 'DuringBossFight'){ var Event = ev.event(); var eventKey = [mapId, HiteventId, 'D']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, true); }; }); }; function IsDead(){ return (PlayerDead); }; function Lasers(Positions, Fire){ var Exist = {}; for (const coord of Positions) { Exist[coord] = true; }; var PlayerX = Math.round($gamePlayer.x); var PlayerY = Math.round($gamePlayer.y); $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var eventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName in Exist){ var Event = ev.event(); var x = Event.x; var y = Event.y; var HorV = FigureHorV(EventName); if (Fire == false) { var AnimationId = 133; if (HorV == "V"){ AnimationId = 134; }; var character = $gameMap.event(eventId); character.requestAnimation(AnimationId); }; if (Fire == true) { var AnimationId = 135; if (HorV == "V"){ AnimationId = 136; }; var character = $gameMap.event(eventId); character.requestAnimation(AnimationId); }; if (Fire == true) { if ((HorV == "V") && (PlayerX == x)){ OnHit(); return; }; if (HorV == "H" && PlayerY == y){ OnHit(); return; }; }; }; }); return PlayerHit; }; function PerFiring(Positions, Timer){ setTimeout(function(){ if (IsDead() == false){ Lasers(Positions, false); setTimeout(function(){ if (IsDead() == false){ if (Lasers(Positions, true)){ PlayerDead = true; }; }; }, LaserAlertTime * 1000); }; }, 1000 * Timer); }; var bossKey = [mapId, eventId, 'A']; var bossSwitchValue = $gameSelfSwitches.value(bossKey); if (bossSwitchValue == true){ var TimerStuff = 0; for (let step = 0; step < 9; step++) { var ToPosition = "LaserV" + (step + 1).toString(); var Positions = [ToPosition]; TimerStuff = TimerStuff + 1; PerFiring(Positions, 1 * TimerStuff); }; for (let step = 0; step < 8; step++) { var ToPosition = "LaserV" + (8 - step).toString(); var Positions = [ToPosition]; TimerStuff = TimerStuff + 1; PerFiring(Positions, 1 * TimerStuff); }; for (let step = 0; step < 5; step++) { var ToPosition = "LaserV" + (1 + (step*2)).toString(); var Positions = [ToPosition]; TimerStuff = TimerStuff + 1; PerFiring(Positions, 1 * TimerStuff); }; var Other = [ [2, 9], [1, 4], [3, 6], [5], [9], [1,9], [3, 7], [2, 8], [1, 5, 9], ]; for (let step = 0; step < Other.length; step++) { var Positions = []; var PerStep = Other[step]; for (let i = 0; i < PerStep.length; i++) { var ToPosition = "LaserV" + (PerStep[i]).toString(); Positions.push(ToPosition); }; TimerStuff = TimerStuff + .75; PerFiring(Positions, 1 * TimerStuff); }; this.wait(TimerStuff * 60 + 60); };

var variableId = 20; var CvariableId = 21; var StunTimer = 5; var PrevX = 0; var PrevY = 0; var CurrentPhase = $gameVariables.value(variableId); var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; $gameVariables.setValue(CvariableId, $gameVariables.value(variableId)); $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var eventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName == 'BossAnimations'){ var eventKey = [mapId, eventId, 'C']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, true); var Event = ev.event(); var bossX = Event.x; var bossY = Event.y; $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev2) { var HitBoxName = ev2.event().name; var hitBoxId = ev2.eventId(); PrevX = ev2.event().x; PrevY = ev2.event().y; if (HitBoxName == 'BossHitbox'){ $gameMap.event(hitBoxId).setPosition(bossX, bossY); }; }); }; }); this.wait(StunTimer * 60);

var variableId = 20; var CvariableId = 21; var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; if ($gameVariables.value(CvariableId) == $gameVariables.value(variableId)){ $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev2) { var HitBoxName = ev2.event().name; var hitBoxId = ev2.eventId(); if (HitBoxName == 'BossHitbox'){ $gameMap.event(hitBoxId).setPosition(0, 0); }; if (HitBoxName == 'BossAnimations'){ var eventKey = [mapId, hitBoxId, 'C']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, false); }; }); };

if (bossSwitchValue == 1){ var TimerStuff = 0; var Other = [ ['V5'], ['V4', 'V6'], ['V3', 'V7'], ['V2', 'V8'], ['V1', 'V9'], ['H4'], ['H3'], ['H1', 'V1', 'V9'], ['H2', 'V2', 'V8'], ['H3', 'V3', 'V7'], ['H4', 'V4', 'V6'], ['H2', 'V5'], ['V1', 'V5', 'V9'], ['V2', 'V3', 'V4', 'V6', 'V7', 'V8'], ['H2', 'H3'], ['V1', 'V9'], ['H1', 'H4', 'V5'], ['V4', 'V6'], ['V2', 'V8', 'H1'], ['V3', 'V7'], ['V5', 'H3'], ['V4', 'V5', 'V6'], ['V2','V3','V4','V5','V6','V7','V8'], ['V1', 'V9'], ['V1','V2', 'V8','V9'], ]; for (let step = 0; step < Other.length; step++) { var Positions = []; var PerStep = Other[step]; for (let i = 0; i < PerStep.length; i++) { var ToPosition = "Laser" + (PerStep[i]); Positions.push(ToPosition); }; if (step > 7){ TimerStuff = TimerStuff + .85; }else{ TimerStuff = TimerStuff + 1; }; PerFiring(Positions, 1 * TimerStuff); }; this.wait(TimerStuff * 60 + 60); };

this has to be called at the very last

var variableId = 20; var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; $gameVariables.setValue(variableId, 0); $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var HiteventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName == 'BossAttacks'){ var Event = ev.event(); var eventKey = [mapId, HiteventId, 'A']; $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, false); }; });
